title: ulagam shuTri
sahitya:
ulagam shuTri onru nIyenum uNmai kaNDEnE paramA


anupallavi

  pala pala nATTilum pala pAnmaiyAna paNpATTilum
pArinukku pariti pOlE OrAnma sam ayOgattAl


caraNam    indiyAvin uLLarivum ingilAndin ulagarivum 
iniya nippan kalai arivum ilagu raSSiyat-tozhilarivum
mundu sellum kAla vEga mudalarivum nidam arindu
mUla shakti pAlai aruLAl mukkAlamum takkAruDan
